value:
$WmMPID_チキ覚醒,ch04_12_Tiki_F_Normal,Face|$w0|In the end, you lose everyone you
love. But the memories of those you
meet in each age will stay with you.$k$p

$WmMPID_ミルラ,ch08_09_Myrrh_F_Normal,Face|$w0|You and I have talked of so much.
If I keep those memories with me,
I know I'll never be lonely.$k$p

$WmMPID_ギュンター,ch05_23_Gunther_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I am the forgotten dragon.
The betrayed king.
The entombed god...$k$p

$WmMPID_チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I slept for long enough! Now I want
to stay here with you and not sleep
any more.$k$p

$WmMPID_神階ソティス,ch17_05_Sothis_F_God01,Face|$w0|Both sides of time are now revealed...
to you alone. I am The Beginning.
What shall you do?$k$p
